gmcm.section.general.tooltip: Basic settings for land fish behavior.
gmcm.enabled.name: Enabled
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: If disabled, the mod does nothing.
gmcm.fishPerLocation.name: Fish per location
gmcm.fishPerLocation.tooltip: How many fish to keep swimming on land in each loaded location.
gmcm.spawnIndoors.name: Spawn indoors
gmcm.spawnIndoors.tooltip: If enabled, fish can appear inside buildings too.
gmcm.respawnEachDay.name: Respawn each day
gmcm.respawnEachDay.tooltip: If enabled, fish are regenerated each morning.
gmcm.updateTicks.name: Update interval (ticks)
gmcm.updateTicks.tooltip: How often fish movement updates. Lower = smoother, higher = less CPU usage.
gmcm.section.movement.tooltip: How fish choose targets and move.
gmcm.wanderRadius.name: Wander radius (tiles)
gmcm.wanderRadius.tooltip: How far fish can pick a new target from their current position.
gmcm.speed.name: Speed
gmcm.speed.tooltip: Movement speed in pixels per update. (Displayed as a decimal)
gmcm.section.visuals.tooltip: How the fish look while swimming.
gmcm.scale.name: Scale
gmcm.opacity.name: Opacity
gmcm.bob.name: Bobbing
gmcm.bob.tooltip: How much the fish bob up and down while swimming.
gmcm.wiggle.name: Wiggle
gmcm.wiggle.tooltip: How much the fish tilt/wiggle while moving.
